entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind north 30 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
